subject: Title IX (Gender Discrimination Legislation)
Women and Girls
College Athletics
Polls and Public Opinion
lead_paragraph: Many of those familiar with the gender equity law say it has been good for men and women in sports, but the public is much more likely to describe it as harmful to men.
snippet: Many of those familiar with the gender equity law say it has been good for men and women in sports, but the public is much more likely to describe it as harmful to men.
